original_title: Injunction order issued against Dayasiri Jayasekara
original_body_lines: The Colombo District Court has issued an injunction order on the former General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP), Dayasiri Jayasekara preventing him from hindering the affairs of the Acting General Secretary of the party Sarathi Dushmantha Mithrapala and submitting inaccurate recommendations to the Election Commission in relation to the matter.
Colombo District Judge Sandun Withana ordered that the relevant injunction will be effective until January 21, 2024.

This order was issued after considering a petition filed by the Chairman of the SLFP, former President Maithripala Sirisena and the Acting General Secretary of the party Sarathi Dushmantha today (Jan. 08).
